entry.title: 2" x 2" Black Diamond Chair Buckle Sash Pins
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 2.29 - 428.99 (2 variants)

[About]

QTY: 1 Sash Pin / Order
Material: Stainless Steel and Rhinestones
Color: Black
Style: Diamond Rhinestone Encrusted Pin
Diameter: 2"
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Note: Sashes, chaircovers, and other decorative accessories not included
Click here for our Sash Collection

[Information]

Illuminate your party ambiance like a royal realm, by adding a touch of imperial shimmer and glimmer into it. With the bedazzling selection of our acrylic diamond and rhinestone embedded stainless steel brooch/buckles, you can now attain that super glamorous party look that mimics the vogue of a Royal Highness! Chic geometric shapes coupled with peerless diamond sparkle make these glimmering embellishments a true emblem of royalty and elegance. For posh parties and pompous guests, nothing could surpass the glitz and glam exuded by these rhinestone encrusted metal buckles. The impeccable sheen of acrylic diamonds fused with the seamless luster of stainless steel makes these bejeweled brooches one of a kind. Attach these with our satin, organza, taffeta, lace, and other fascinating fabric chair sashes, runners, napkins, or invites. Give an open flow to your inspiration and design diva-style gowns, hair accessories or adorn your favors and keepsakes with these gemmed buckles.

Additional Information:

  • QTY: 1 Sash Pin / Order
  • Material: Stainless Steel and Rhinestones
  • Color: Black
  • Style: Diamond Rhinestone Encrusted Pin
  • Diameter: 2"
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Simply open the back safety pin to use with spandex sash for bow-look effect or use as desired with regular sash ties
  • Best used for various events like weddings, birthdays, and parties!
  • Note: Sashes, chaircovers, and other decorative accessories not included
  • Click here for our Sash Collection
